review: Constant disconnects with my Samsung S5. Constant disconnects with my iPhone 6.
author: Josh Bolton

review: We love this and use it all the time to stream netflix and YouTube.
author: Mary Beth Pipes

review: Other than Netflix and YouTube videos (which are optimized for Chromecast) the videos played from websites such as Food Network are so jerky and jittery that it's too disgusting to watch. The videos look okay on the computer, but so many frames are dropped by Chromecast that it's not useful. I've worked with it, adjusting everything according to recommendations, and it's sadly not up to watching Internet videos. Too bad it doesn't live up to its potential.
author: Chad Peery

review: Cheap version of Apple TV it will only let you stream what Google says is ok and if your signal is weak ( router downstairs your upstairs ) it will buffer a lot. Netflix and YouTube work the best.
author: Tony

review: Great product at a super price !!
author: Howie

review: Google Chromscast is awesome! We use it on a TV that doesn't have a DVD player or any attachments. This enables us to watch Netflix or HBO Go on that TV. The only downside is that it doesn't play Amazon Instant Watch. Maybe some day soon?
author: Lindsey R. Watson "LRae"
